parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: A client token to ensure the idempotence of the request. Generate a unique value on your client for this parameter. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot be more than 64 characters long.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the return value. Valid values:

- zh: Chinese.

- en: English.

Default value: en

parameters.name: UserClientIp
parameters.description: The IP address of the client.

parameters.name: Vpcs
parameters.description:
The list of VPCs.

> If you leave this parameter empty, all VPCs are unbound from the zone.

parameters.name: ZoneId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the zone.
